description: Ornamental onion (Allium 'Millenium') is an amazing perennial that adds an explosion of colour to your garden. With huge, beautiful round flower heads in shades of purple and white, it's an eye-catching variety that is sure to make a showy statement. It's an easy to grow plant that prefers full sun to part shade and tolerant of a variety of conditions, making it a great choice for those who don't have much gardening experience. It's also drought tolerant and deer resistant, making it ideal for dry, high traffic areas in the garden. With its incredible blooms, ornamental onion is one plant that would really make your garden shine.
